CodeBlockMethod.Name: SetTime
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if(self.Entity ~= _UserService.LocalPlayer) then return end if(time < 0) then self.UITime.TextComponent.Text = string.format("레지스탕스 점령 %d 초", math.abs(time)) elseif(time > 0) then self.UITime.TextComponent.Text = string.format("블랙윙 점령 %d 초", time) else self.UITime.TextComponent.Text = " " end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: UI_on
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if(self.Entity ~= _UserService.LocalPlayer) then return end self.UITime.Enable = true

CodeBlockMethod.Name: UI_off
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if(self.Entity ~= _UserService.LocalPlayer) then return end self.UITime.Enable = false
